text: Armix is a commune. It is in the Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes region in the Ain department in east France. In 2012, 24 people lived in the commune. It is the least populated commune in the Ain department. The inhabitants are the Armixois. Seismic activity affects this commune. ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department ==Other websites== * Category:Communes in Ain
title: Armix
